content: store your grocery bags with your own handmade crochet bag holder you can add bags into the top of the holder and pull them out of the bottom > subscribe to my newsletter 1 to be notified when new patterns come out this pattern uses 210 yards of a medium weight cotton yarn but acrylic can be used too a video tutorial is available for this pattern on my youtube channel https //youtu be/5j8yw7eohki materials 210 yards of medium 4-weight cotton yarn yarn used loops & threads capri eco cotton & lion brand pima cotton 5 00 mm h/8 crochet hook yarn needle to weave in ends stitch markers scissors 1 https //subscribepage io/mfhzxe
